queue_url.title: Queue URL
queue_url.description: The full AWS endpoint URL of the SQS Queue.

region.title: AWS Region
region.description: The region code for the SQS Queue.

delete_messages.title: Delete Messages After Read
delete_messages.description: If Enabled, messages will be deleted from the SQS Queue after being read. If Disabled, messages are left in the queue and can be read more than once. WARNING: Enabling this option can result in data loss in cases of failure, use with caution, see documentation for more detail.

max_batch_size.title: Max Batch Size
max_batch_size.description: The max amount of messages to consume in a single poll (10 max)

max_wait_time.title: Max Wait Time
max_wait_time.description: The max amount of time (in seconds) to poll for messages before committing a batch (or timing out) unless we fill a batch (as per Max Batch Size) (20 max)

attributes_to_return.title: Message Attributes To Return
attributes_to_return.description: A comma separated list of Attributes to return for each message

visibility_timeout.title: Message Visibility Timeout
visibility_timeout.description: After a message is read, how much time (in seconds) should the message be hidden from other consumers. After this timeout, the message is not deleted and can be re-read.

access_key.title: AWS IAM Access Key ID
access_key.description: The Access Key for the IAM User with permissions on this Queue. See the docs for more information on how to obtain this key.

secret_key.title: AWS IAM Secret Key
secret_key.description: The Secret Key for the IAM User with permissions on this Queue. See the docs for more information on how to obtain this key.
